DOC.brief_summary: Forty-five infertile woman undergo vitro fertilization treatment manage uterine cavity injection day 2 embryo culture supernatant day 3 embryo transfer . No statistically significant difference find implantation pregnancy rate compare control group .
DOC.brief_title: Injection Day 2 Embryo Culture Supernatant Into Uterine Cavity Did n't Improve Implantation Pregnancy Rates
DOC.detailed_description: Study design sample size This randomize clinical trial involve ninety patient undergoing conventional IVF intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) treatment Reproductive Medical Center . The subject recruit studied period 6 month January June 2008 . The study approve Ethics Committee Shen-Zhen Maternity Child Healthcare Hospital . Subjects sign informed consent form . According guideline make Ethics Committee Shen-Zhen Maternity Child Healthcare Hospital , good accomplish study within six month . We calculate , center , sample size 100 subject would need recruited 6 month period . We end 90 patient study . Subject Ninety infertile woman , age 23-39 year , infertile duration 3-8 year , enrol infertility treatment clinic January June 2008 . The selection criterion participant woman first go undergo IVF ICSI treatment . Women treat natural cycle IVF appropriate embryo ET exclude . The infertility factor identify follow : tubal ( n=54 ) , unexplained ( n=3 ) , male n=22 ) , endometriosis ( n=9 ) , others ( n=2 ) . The selection enrollment subject decide three physician . All subject inform procedure new technique , effectiveness confirm , although optimal outcome patient blastocyst transfer obtain use technique purpose ( 6 ) . During selection procedure , four eligible subject opt participate counsel uncertain effectiveness , two subject decline randomize . Finally , 90 eligible patient enrol . Randomization First , ninety random number generate mean computer randomly divide study group control group . Then , subject enrol date order arrange accord sequence random number . So , ninety subject randomly divide study group control group . The random allocation sequence conceal close dark-colored envelope day oocyte pick-up . Randomization occur patient agree participate study ( Figure 1 ) . All woman two group underwent conventional IVF ICSI procedure , study group , patient add uterine cavity injection day 2 embryo culture supernatant . The IVF ICSI procedure perform physician laboratory technician . The treat sequence subject enrol sequence . The study blind , patient well clinician aware study content . IVF ISCI procedure injection technique embryo culture supernatant Controlled ovarian hyperstimulation perform use variety protocol , previously publish elsewhere ( 8 ) . A down-regulation pituitary realize triptorelin ( Triptorelin Acetate Injection , Ferring , Germany ) administration S.C. , 0.1 mg/d×7 , start day 21 previous cycle . Ovarian stimulation start day 3 stimulate cycle use recombinant follicle stimulate hormone ( rFSH , Gonal-F , Serono , Switzerland ) , 225-300IU daily S.C.. The follicle development monitor transvaginal ultrasound scan ( TVS ) . 250ug HCG ( Ovitrelle ; Serono , Madrid ) administer I.M . one two leading follicle ( ) reach mean diameter 18 mm . In general , transvaginal oocyte retrieval perform 36 h HCG injection . The medium use embryo culture IVF-60 . Briefly , oocyte retrieval ( day 0 ) , cumulus-enclosed oocyte incubate IVF-60 . Semen prepare 45-90 discontinuous gradient . The result pellet wash IVF-60 . For normal IVF , 100,000 150,000 sperm/100ul use oocyte . The maturation stage oocyte assess IVF 15-18 hour insemination ( day 1 ) . Cumulus corona cell remove use drawn pipette . When ICSI perform , oocyte denude HYASE . Each mature oocyte place 6-ul droplet GAMETE-20 . The partner 's sperm place 6-ul droplet ICSI-100 . All droplets overlay OVOIL . ICSI perform use invert microscope RI micromanipulators ( INTEGRA Micromanipulation System , Research Instruments , UK ) . The CO2 incubator ( Forma , USA ) 6 % CO2 gas use embryo incubation . An embryo score system base cleavage rate morphologic feature use evaluation embryo quality , previously describe elsewhere ( 9 ) . Briefly , grade 1 best score grade 5 bad . For example , grade 1 embryo blastomere equal size cytoplasmic fragmentation . A grade 2 embryo symmetric blastomere , small degree cytoplasmic fragmentation involve ≤10 % embryo 's surface . Grades 3 5 demonstrate progressive embryo cytoplasmic fragmentation variable cell symmetry . On day 2 , embryos translate old dish new dish fresh medium culture continuously . In study group , embryo culture supernatant old dish aspirate use embryo transfer catheter ( COOK-5000 , Australia ) inject patient 's uterine cavity . ET perform third day embryo culture . Two three embryo select transfer woman . The number embryo select transfer base morphologic criteria additional factor , duration cause infertility age patient . Pregnancy determine carry urine pregnancy test 14 day ET . The embryo implantation , number gestational sac , embryo heart pulsation determine TVS seventh week pregnancy . Except day 2 embryo culture supernatant injection , above-mentioned clinical laboratory procedure identical study group control group . Statistical analysis Baseline characteristic patient express mean ±standard deviation frequency proportion ( % ) . The pregnancy implantation rate calculate base case pregnancy number gestational sac . A Chi-Square Test use compare implantation conception proportion two group . The Statistics Package Social Science ( SPSS 13.0 ; SPSS Inc. ) use statistical analysis . Statistical significance set P < 0.05 .
